answers.answer: If it was ur water breaking it would still come out... not like gushing but just a steady stream. Try going for a walk to see if you have any contractions or anything. If not then its prolly was just urine. If you get too worried call ur doctor again. Good luck!
If you are really concerned go to the e.r ,thry will test you if its your water.
Lisha I was wondering if you wouldn't mind sharing your experience so far......I am 9 weeks and at high risk for gestational diabetes and SCARED.

question: Hi I am 34 weeks but baby is measuring almost 37 with the help of my diabetes. Last night after urinating I experienced horrible pain in the middle of my pelvis. Today I woke up and my vagina is really wet as if I had sex. And its even on my sheets--no blood yet. (Sorry tmi). I called my dr she says its probably urine to not be alarmed but I am. What should I do.
title: 34 weeks and SCARED!!!!
